ðŸ“– Summary: The `ali` repository provides a command-line tool for generating HTTP load against a target URL. It features a terminal-based UI that displays real-time metrics, enabling users to analyze performance and identify bottlenecks during load testing. The tool supports various configuration options, including request rate, duration, custom headers, and TLS settings.
